Gabrielle Giffords is making progress every day. She's using both sides of her body. She's able to breathe on her own. She's able to open her eyes and to show people she understands what she's hearing and seeing, Kirsten Gillibrand said. that its CEO Eric Schmidt will step down from his post April 4th, and will be replaced in the role by company co-founder Larry Page . Eric Schmidt will assume the role of Executive Chairman for the company, focusing on deals, partnerships, customers and broader business relationships, government outreach and technology thought leadership. Google is a strategic partner of Apple's on several fronts, providing the backends for Apple's iOS Maps and YouTube applications, as well as serving as the default search engine for its Safari browser.
